in.cost: Free for JioCinema (streaming), Varies for Star Sports TV packages
in.additionalInfo: JioCinema offers free streaming of all IPL matches. Star Sports holds TV broadcast rights.

us.additionalInfo: Willow TV offers both TV and streaming options. Hotstar provides streaming of all IPL matches.

gb.cost: £24.99/month for Sky Sports, £33.99/month for NOW TV Sports Membership
gb.additionalInfo: Sky Sports shows all IPL matches live. NOW TV offers streaming of Sky Sports channels.

au.cost: Varies for Foxtel packages, AUD 25/month for Kayo Sports
au.additionalInfo: Fox Cricket shows all IPL matches. Kayo Sports offers streaming of Fox Cricket.

nz.additionalInfo: Sky Sport holds rights to broadcast IPL matches in New Zealand.

za.additionalInfo: SuperSport holds rights to broadcast IPL matches in South Africa and sub-Saharan Africa.

ca.additionalInfo: Willow TV provides both TV and streaming options for IPL matches in Canada.

ae.additionalInfo: beIN Sports holds rights to broadcast IPL matches in the UAE and MENA region.

sg.additionalInfo: StarHub broadcasts IPL matches in Singapore.

lk.additionalInfo: Dialog TV broadcasts IPL matches in Sri Lanka through Sky Sports channels.
